title: Nibiru Spacebar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Buffet
description: Offers an aperitivo bar from 6:30pm-10:30pm featuring a rich buffet with a wide variety of choices, all dishes are vegetarian or vegan. Examples: potato and zucchini frittata; steamed, roasted and raw vegetables with basmati rice; mushrooms, dried tomatoes, cauliflower; a variety of cheese selctions including mozzarella di bufala and ricotta; pasta of the day; bruschette; made-in-house guacamole, tapenade, hummus; mixed fruits; desserts. A variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, cocktails, beer, mixed drinks and fruit ices are available. Check online for reservation details.
